body: Where do i post a video of someone i think is hacking ? Because i was playing nexus and i couldnt even get a hit on someone and the only time i did he lagged so i though maybe kill ourea i taken a video and can you tell me where to post the video.
body_tagged: Where do i post a video of someone i think is hacking ? Because i was playing nexus and i couldnt even get a hit on someone and the only time i did he lagged so i though maybe kill ourea i taken a video and can you tell me where to post the video.
title: Where do i post a video

replies.body:
You can post it on Youtube.
Make sure to make the video "unlisted".

Then file an online report by going to the "Player reports" section.
This is located under the "Administration" tab.

Make sure to link your Youtube video in the report.
There're also stickyed topics on how to create a well-structured report as well.
